## IDE / Tool Name

[e.g., Zed AI, JetBrains AI Assistant, Copilot Workspace]

## Tool Type

- [ ] Desktop IDE with local storage (SQLite, JSON, etc.)
- [ ] CLI tool (terminal-based)
- [ ] VS Code extension
- [ ] Cloud-only (no local data)
- [ ] Other

## Data Storage Location

Where does this tool store conversation data? (if known)

- **macOS**: `~/Library/Application Support/...`
- **Linux**: `~/.config/...`
- **Windows**: `%APPDATA%/...`

## Data Format

What format is the data stored in? (if known)

- [ ] SQLite database
- [ ] JSON / JSONL files
- [ ] Plain text logs
- [ ] Unknown
